feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.16
New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.17
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Websocket ready
  • Bank Transaction fiter fixes
  • Task export fixes
  • Project current hours duration set sync now.
  • Tax rule for Poland (PL) by @wizardeur in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9828
  • Paypal AC DC by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9831
  • Clarifications, links added, Links fixed by @DrDBanner in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9833
  • Fixes for bank transaction filters / number formatting by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9842
  • Payment driver rotessa by @karneaud in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9704
  • Fixes for PayPal FraudNet by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9846
  • v5.10.17 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9851

New Contributors

  • @wizardeur made their first contribution in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9828
  • @DrDBanner made their first contribution in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9833
  • @karneaud made their first contribution in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9704

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.16...v5.10.17

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.18
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for translations in client portal by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9857
  • Remove migration for tax models by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9858
  • Updated CSS by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9859
  • Updated CSS by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9860
  • Fixes for recurring invoice queries by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9865

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.17...v5.10.18

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.19
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for subscriptions by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9874
  • Minor fixes by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9875

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.18...v5.10.19

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.20
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for EU tax calculations
  • Expense category filters
  • Add logic to support task.is_running
  • Improvements for twig and special character encoding
  • Improvements for PayPal Rest integration
  • Fixes for Subscriptions displaying unrelated plans
  • Updated chart queries
  • Updated translations
  • Remove PayPal Express
  • Updated company migration for EU tax model
  • v5.10.20 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9882

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.19...v5.10.20
